div.h4: A sampling of work previously done.

div.div:
Executive Cleaning Solutions
this site was developed for a commerical office cleaning operaition. It displays a map, as well as a form used for contact purposes. We used AJAX calls for data and left the frame intact.

Mathematics Subject Classification
This site is the entire field of mathematics broken down into a searchable framework. So what I'm really doing now is not creating clever copy for my site as much as getting the look and feel correct on the css... Not sure what is the most important, but doing someghing is!!!

Upland Homesinc
This site was done for a realtor. A template from an old site loaded with flash content. The flash content needed to be stripped out. The framework stayed the same. However, a re-engineering took place to achieve the same effect. It's lighter than the origional design. A quicker load time.

Critical Security
This was an ongoing contract position servicing several critical servers in the health care industry. Uptime, system / network performance, and cost.

Capture 3D
Here we build a device driver for the Motoman Robot. The operating system was a Suse Linux. They were running a German built piece of software to enable the automation of the hydraulic robot. The project was to learn the existing codebase, add the driver so as to communicate to the robot. Add any extra functionality. the project finished very successfully.

Innovative Leather Technologies
This company processes raw hides into usable leather to upholster automotive seats. This is a factory that runs several processing lines with an eye for growth. What they wanted was a system that can track raw materials as they entered and be able to convert that data into usable product and provide the breakdown in raw materials v finished product.
Some wonderfully written text about what great work I accomplished here
